title: JLN Stadium in a mess after Diljit Dosanjh concert
selftext: Stadium built by tax payers money, tax payers trashes the stadium, tax payers pay for cleaning the stadium, the stadium was closed for 10 days for the athletes, their training equipment were destroyed, seriously, tax payers of our country are low IQ, they deserve road with potholes, dirty air and water. Keep crying losers.
